00014 int String2Int(const std::string& str)
00015 {
00016         int result = 0;
00017     std::string::const_iterator i = str.begin();
00018  
00019     if (i == str.end())
00020         return -999;
00021  
00022     bool negative = false;
00023  
00024     if (*i == '-')
00025     {
00026         negative = true;
00027         ++i;
00028  
00029         if (i == str.end())
00030             return -999;;
00031     }
00032  
00033     result = 0;
00034  
00035     for (; i != str.end(); ++i)
00036     {
00037         if (*i < '0' || *i > '9')
00038             return -999;;
00039  
00040         result *= 10;
00041         result += *i - '0';
00042     }
00043  
00044     if (negative)
00045     {
00046         result = -result;
00047     }
00048  
00049     return result;
00050 }

00069 void superkalkulator::Save(){
00070    ofstream outfile;
00071    outfile.open("Log.txt",ios::app);
00072    for(int i = 0;i<=Log.getTopStack()-1;i++)
00073    {
00074                 outfile << Log.getData(i) << endl;
00075    }
00076    outfile.close();
00077    cout<<"Save success"<<endl;
00078 }

00080 void superkalkulator::Input(string input){
00081 
00082         if(input == "Set")
00083         {
00084                 string pilihan;
00085                 string smode;
00086                 int mode;
00087                 cout<<".....Set....."<<endl;
00088                 cout<<"Silahkan masukkan pilihan ekspresi(e) atau mode kalkulator(k)"<<endl;
00089                 std::getline(std::cin,pilihan);
00090                 if(pilihan == "e")
00091                 {
00092                         cout<<"Masukkan mode ekspresi"<<endl;
00093                         cout<<"1. Prefix"<<endl;
00094                         cout<<"2. Sufix"<<endl;
00095                         cout<<"3. PostFix"<<endl;
00096                         std::getline(std::cin,smode);
00097                         mode = String2Int(smode);
00098                         setMode(mode);
00099                         cout<<"Berhasil"<<endl;
00100                 }
00101                 else if(pilihan == "k")
00102                 {
00103                         cout<<"Masukkan mode kalkulator"<<endl;
00104                         cout<<"1. Arab"<<endl;
00105                         cout<<"2. Logika"<<endl;
00106                         cout<<"3. Romawi"<<endl;
00107                         std::getline(std::cin,smode);
00108                         mode = String2Int(smode);
00109                         setKalkulator(mode);
00110                         cout<<"Berhasil"<<endl;
00111                 }
00112                 else
00113                 {
00114                         cout<<"Masukkan tidak sesuai"<<endl<<"Tidak berhasil"<<endl;
00115                 }
00116                 this->WriteLog(input);
00117                 
00118         }
00119         else if(input.substr(0,7) == "ShowMem")
00120         {
00121                 cout<<".....ShowMem....."<<endl;
00122                 int n = String2Int(input.substr(8,input.length()));
00123                 if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00124                 {
00125                         for(int i = Log.getDataCount() - n;i<=Log.getDataCount()-1;i++)
00126                         {
00127                                 cout<<"Data-"<<i+1<<" : "<<Log.getData(i)<<endl;
00128                         }
00129                 }
00130                 else
00131                 {
00132                         cout<<"Jumlah log lebih kecil dari yang diminta"<<endl;
00133                 }
00134                 this->WriteLog(input);
00135         }
00136         else if(input == "Show All")
00137         {
00138                 cout<<".....Show All....."<<endl;
00139                 this->WriteLog(input);
00140                 if(Log.getDataCount() == 0)
00141                 {
00142                         cout<<"Log Kosong"<<endl;
00143                 }
00144                 else
00145                 {
00146                         for(int i = 0;i<Log.getDataCount();i++)
00147                         {
00148                                 cout<<"Data-"<<i+1<<" : "<<Log.getData(i)<<endl;
00149                         }
00150                 }
00151                 
00152         }
00153         else if(input.substr(0,4) == "Redo")
00154         {
00155                 cout<<".....Redo....."<<endl;
00156                 int n = String2Int(input.substr(5,input.length()));
00157                 this->Redo(n);
00158                 //this->WriteLog(input);
00159                 //Tidak dimasukkan ke dalam log karena jika redo dijalankan setelah redo maka akan terjadi looping
00160         }
00161         else if(input.substr(0,4) == "Undo")
00162         {       
00163                 //this->WriteLog(input);
00164                 //Tidak dimasukkan ke dalam log karena jika redo dijalankan setelah undo maka akan terjadi keanehan semantik
00165                 
00166                 cout<<".....Undo....."<<endl;
00167                 int n = String2Int(input.substr(5,input.length()-1));
00168                 this->Undo(n);
00169         }
00170         else if(input == "Save")
00171         {
00172                 cout<<".....Save....."<<endl;
00173                 this->Save();
00174                 this->WriteLog(input);
00175                 
00176         }
00177         else if(input == "help")
00178         {
00179                 cout<<".....Help....."<<endl;
00180                 cout<<"Command List"<<endl;
00181                 cout<<"1). Set"<<endl;
00182                 cout<<"2). ShowMem x"<<endl;
00183                 cout<<"3). Show All"<<endl;
00184                 cout<<"4). Redo x"<<endl;
00185                 cout<<"5). Save"<<endl;
00186                 
00187         }
00188         else if(input[0] == '(' || input[0] == '0' || input[0] == '1' || input[0] == '2' || input[0] == '3'
00189         || input[0] == '4' || input[0] == '5'|| input[0] == '6'|| input[0] == '7'|| input[0] == '8'|| input[0] == '9'
00190         || input[0] == 'M' || input[0] == 'D' || input[0] == 'C' || input[0] == 'L' || input[0] == 'X'
00191                 || input[0] == 'V'|| input[0] == 'I' || input[0] == '~' || input[0] == '&' || input[0] == '|')
00192         {
00193                 cout<<".....Ekspresi....."<<endl;
00194                 ArabCalc *arab;
00195                 RomanCalc *roman;
00196                 cout<<"Check"<<CheckEkspresiType(input)<<endl;
00197                 cout<<"Input"<<input<<endl;
00198                 if(CheckEkspresiType(input) == modekalkulator || (modekalkulator == 1 && CheckEkspresiType(input) == 0) || (modekalkulator == 2 && CheckEkspresiType(input) == 0))
00199                 {
00200                         switch(modekalkulator)
00201                         {
00202                                 case 1 : cout<<"Running Kalk Arab ";
00203                                                 arab = new ArabCalc(input,modeekspresi,70);
00204                                                 cout<<"Hasil "<<arab->Calculate()<<endl;
00205                                                 break;
00206                                 case 2 : cout<<"Running Kalk Logika ";
00207                                                 break;
00208                                 case 3 : cout<<"Running Kalk Romawi ";
00209                                                 roman = new RomanCalc(input,modeekspresi,70);
00210                                                 cout<<"Hasil "<<roman->Calculate()<<endl;       
00211                                                 break;
00212                                 default: break;
00213                         }
00214                         switch(modeekspresi)
00215                         {
00216                                 case 1 : cout<<"in prefix mode"<<endl;break;
00217                                 case 2 : cout<<"in Infix mode"<<endl;break;
00218                                 case 3 : cout<<"in postfix mode"<<endl;break;
00219                                 default: break;
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222                 else
00223                 {
00224                         cout<<"Jenis ekspresi tidak sesuai kalkulator"<<endl;
00225                 }
00226                 this->WriteLog(input);
00227         }
00228         /*else
00229         {
00230                 cout<<"Ketik help untuk bantuan"<<endl<<"Ketik exit untuk keluar"<<endl;
00231         }*/
00232 }

00234 void superkalkulator::Undo(int n){
00235         string out;
00236         if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00237         {
00238                 int temp = Log.getDataCount();
00239                 for(int i = temp - n;i<=temp-1;i++)
00240                 {
00241                         cout<<"Pushed : "<<Log.getData(i)<<endl;
00242                         this->Log>>out;
00243                 }
00244         }
00245         else
00246         {
00247                 cout<<"Penghapusan gagal"<<endl;
00248         }
00249         
00250 }
00251 
00252 void superkalkulator::Redo(int n){
00253         if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00254         {
00255                 int temp = Log.getDataCount();
00256                 for(int i = temp - n;i<=temp-1;i++)
00257                 {
00258                         this->Input(Log.getData(i));
00259                 }
00260         }
00261         else
00262         {
00263                 cout<<"Jumlah log lebih kecil dari yang diminta"<<endl;
00264         }
00265 
00266 }

00292 int superkalkulator::CheckEkspresiType(string ekspresi)
00293 {
00294         int mode;
00295         string tempekspresi = ekspresi;
00296         int Exit = 0;
00297         int ArabnLogika = 0;
00298         while(tempekspresi.length() != 0 && Exit==0)
00299         {
00300                 if(tempekspresi[0] == '~' || tempekspresi[0] == '&' || tempekspresi[0] == '|')
00301                 {
00302                         mode = 2;
00303                         Exit = 1;
00304                 }
00305                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == 'M' || tempekspresi[0] == 'D' || tempekspresi[0] == 'C' || tempekspresi[0] == 'L' || tempekspresi[0] == 'X'|| tempekspresi[0] == 'V'|| tempekspresi[0] == 'I')
00306                 {
00307                         mode = 3;
00308                         Exit = 1;
00309                 }
00310                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == '+' || tempekspresi[0] == '-' || tempekspresi[0] == '*' || tempekspresi[0] == ':' || tempekspresi[0] == '/' || tempekspresi[0] == '%')
00311                 {
00312                         mode = 1;
00313                         Exit = 1;
00314                 }
00315                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == '0' || tempekspresi[0] == '1')
00316                 {
00317                         if(tempekspresi.length() > 1)
00318                         {
00319                                 if(tempekspresi[1] == '0' || tempekspresi[1] == '1')
00320                                 {
00321                                         mode = 1;
00322                                 }
00323                                 else
00324                                 {
00325                                         mode = 0;
00326                                 }
00327                         }
00328                         else
00329                         {
00330                                 mode = 0;
00331                         }                               
00332                 }
00333                 else if( tempekspresi[0] == '2' || tempekspresi[0] == '3' || tempekspresi[0] == '4' || tempekspresi[0] == '5'
00334                         || tempekspresi[0] == '6'|| tempekspresi[0] == '7' || tempekspresi[0] == '8' || tempekspresi[0] == '9')
00335                 {
00336                         mode = 1;
00337                 }
00338                 tempekspresi.erase(0,1);
00339         }
00340         return mode;
00341 }
